title: Create a BOGO Promotion
description: A marketing manager wants to create a 'Buy One, Get One Free' promotion for a specific brand of shoes.

tasks.description: Define the parameters of the BOGO promotion: applies to all products from 'Brand X', no coupon code needed, automatically applies in cart.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets up the promotion rules.

tasks.description: Activate the promotion and set a start and end date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully activates the BOGO offer for the specified time period.
